messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] New subject...need you veterans to help me
messages.msgSnippet: Karen, I personally haven t adopted, but my mom and dad did, they adopted my little brother back in 1975 from Seoul, Korea, and he also didn t speak any
messages.messageBody:
Karen,

I personally haven't adopted, but my mom and dad did,
they adopted my little brother back in 1975 from
Seoul, Korea, and he also didn't speak any english.

Good luck, and I'm sure you'll do great.




--- Karen Swanay <luvbullbreeds@...> wrote:
